title: My Tickets Page with Advanced Filtering
description:
Create comprehensive ticket list page with advanced filtering, search, and pagination.

Features:
- Full ticket list view at /tickets route
- Filter by: Status (All, Open, In Progress, Resolved, Closed)
- Filter by: Priority (All, P1, P2, P3, P4)
- Filter by: Date range (Created date)
- Search by: Subject and description (real-time search)
- Pagination: 20 tickets per page with mobile-friendly controls
- Click ticket row to navigate to detail page
- Show ticket count per filter
- Empty state when no tickets match filters

Design: Mobile-first with responsive table â†’ card layout
Tech Stack: React, Tailwind, Framer Motion for animations
API Endpoint: GET /api/tickets with query params for filters
